long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The simplest way to share your Amazon cart with others! 

This extension allows users to easily share their Amazon cart with others using a link.

It simply grabs the item codes and quantities from the Amazon cart page and creates a unique URL that allows others to add all the items to their cart with one click. The person you are sharing with does not need this extension or any special software, they just have to click on the link.

Instructions for use:
1. Add items to your Amazon cart as usual
2. Go to your cart in Amazon (you can also click on the extension icon (shopping cart) to go their directly
3. Click the shopping cart extension icon to copy the shared cart link
4. Paste it (ctrl+v on Windows, command+v on Macs) to any messaging app you want to send the link through, or you can keep a link in your own documents for later use.

The receiver can then just click on the link to add all of the items and their quantities to their own cart.

Some helpful use cases:

Sharing a cart with a customer
Sharing a cart with your boss or purchaser at work
Sharing a cart with another Amazon account that you own
Saving carts for later purchases (copy and paste links to a google doc or Keep)
An instructor sharing a cart for all items a class requires
Share a cart with new employees for onboarding
Share a cart for work from home supplies
A college student sharing a cart with their parents to purchase for them (isn't that nice of your parents)
Many others...

Please note this is not an official Amazon extension, it is a simple 3rd party utility.
Also there is an Amazon limitation of 10 max quantity per each item in your cart, so keep that in mind if you deal in large quantities of a single item.

Benefits over Amazon's wish list:

More direct way of adding items to their cart (less confusing)
Can specify quantities for each item
Ensures the recipient adds all of the items to their cart, quickly and easily
Can share with multiple people easily
